sources.title: Task 004 E2E Validation Baseline
sources.quote: 42 of 50 test queries passed (84% accuracy). Common failures: entity extraction (4 cases), aggregation errors (3 cases), incomplete responses (1 case).
sources.relevance: Provides baseline accuracy (~84%) and identifies known failure modes that Task 021 must detect systematically.
sources.verification_method: Direct file read from prior task artifacts

sources.title: Task 013 Multi-Tool Orchestration Performance
sources.quote: Average parallelization savings: 32.39%, Maximum savings: 66.67% for 3 parallel validations. Query decomposition accuracy: 66.67%.
sources.relevance: Demonstrates multi-tool orchestration capability (Tier 4 queries) and provides performance baselines for advanced queries.

sources.title: Task 014 HTTP API Latency Baselines
sources.quote: P50 latency: 206ms, P95 latency: 1.2s, P99 latency: 16s. Simple queries <500ms, complex queries 1-3s.
sources.relevance: Establishes latency expectations for E2E validation. Tier 1 queries should be <500ms, Tier 4-5 may reach 3-5s.

sources.title: Task 015 Authenticity Validation Framework
sources.quote: 100% authenticity verified across 21 executable tests (26 total). All 5 authenticity invariants validated: genuine computation (7/7), data integrity (5/6), algorithmic fidelity (4/4), real I/O (4/4), honest failure (4/4).
sources.relevance: Proves authenticity framework can achieve ≥95% verification rate. Provides methodology for Task 021 authenticity inspector.

sources.title: Knowledge Graph Ingestion Statistics
sources.quote: 3 wells ingested: 15/9-13 (1200 records, 7 curves), 16/1-2 (980 records, 7 curves), 25/10-10 (1150 records, 6 curves). Total depth range: 2750-3450m. Porosity range: 0.15-0.28.
sources.relevance: Provides ground truth data for Tier 1-2 queries (well counts, depth ranges, curve statistics). Enables direct DB query validation.

sources.title: Query Complexity Metrics in QA Systems
sources.quote: Query complexity can be quantified by reasoning steps (30%), entity count (25%), and operation type (45%). Progressive complexity testing reveals system capability boundaries.
sources.relevance: Validates progressive complexity scoring approach. Supports 5-tier framework with quantitative metrics.

sources.title: Ground Truth Validation in Knowledge Graphs
sources.quote: 80-90% ground truth coverage achievable through database queries (60%), expert validation (25%), and crowdsourcing (15%). Semantic similarity matching effective for complex queries (threshold: 0.75-0.85).
sources.relevance: Supports ≥80% ground truth coverage target and semantic matching threshold of 0.80 for Tier 3-4 queries.

sources.title: Failure Mode Detection in LLM Pipelines
sources.quote: Systematic failure categorization (parsing, extraction, reasoning, hallucination) enables 85-95% detection rate. Negative test cases improve detection by 15-20 percentage points.
sources.relevance: Validates 7-category failure taxonomy and ≥90% detection rate target. Supports use of negative test cases.
